description.english: Obtained a Coral Shard
description.german: Du hast eine Korallenscherbe erhalten
description.french: Vous avez obtenu une Couronne de Corail
description.italian: Hai ottenuto un frammento di corallo
description.russian: Ты добыл коралловый осколок
description.spanish: Has obtenido un fragmento de coral
description.brazilian: Você obteve um Fragmento de Coral
description.schinese: 获得了一个珊瑚碎片
description.tchinese: 獲得了一個珊瑚碎片

description.english: Defeated the Fracture of the Deep and reunited the Coral shards
description.german: Du hast die Fraktur der Tiefe besiegt und die Korallenscherben wiedervereint
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la Fracture des Profondeurs et réuni les éclats de Corail
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Terrore delle Profondità e riunito i frammenti di corallo
description.russian: Ты победил Перелом глубины и воссоединил коралловые осколки
description.spanish: Derrotaste a la Fractura del Abismo y reuniste los fragmentos de coral
description.brazilian: Você derrotou a Fratura do Abismo e reuniu os fragmentos de coral
description.schinese: 击败了深海碎影并重组了珊瑚碎片
description.tchinese: 擊敗了深海碎影並重組了珊瑚碎片
description.koreana: 깊은 곳의 균열을 쓰러뜨리고 산호 파편들을 재결합했다

description.english: Destroyed the Ravens' Nest
description.german: Du hast das Rabennest zerstört
description.french: Vous avez détruit le Nid des Corbeaux
description.italian: Hai distrutto il Nido dei Corvi
description.russian: Ты разрушил Гнездо воронов
description.spanish: Destruiste el Nido de los Cuervos
description.brazilian: Você destruiu o Ninho dos Corvos
description.schinese: 摧毁了渡鸦巢穴
description.tchinese: 摧毀了渡鴉巢穴

description.english: Aided Denpang and the Snowspeaker tribe in destroying the Ice Spire and defeating the Icespeakers
description.german: Du hast Denpang und dem Schneerufer-Stamm geholfen, den Eisstachel zu zerstören und die Eisrufer zu besiegen
description.french: Vous avez aidé Denpang et la tribu des Neigeux à détruire l'Épine de Glace et vaincre les Glaciens
description.italian: Hai aiutato Denpang e la tribù dei Portavoce della Neve a distruggere la Guglia di Ghiaccio e sconfiggere i Portavoce del Ghiaccio
description.russian: Ты помог Денпангу и племени Снегоголосов разрушить Ледяной шпиль и победить Ледоголосов
description.spanish: Ayudaste a Denpang y a la tribu Hablanieve a destruir el Pináculo de Hielo y derrotar a los Hablahielo
description.brazilian: Você ajudou Denpang e a tribo dos Nevefalantes a destruir a Agulha de Gelo e derrotar os Gelofalantes
description.schinese: 协助邓庞和雪语者部落摧毁了寒冰尖塔并击败了冰语者
description.tchinese: 協助鄧龐和雪語者部落摧毀了寒冰尖塔並擊敗了冰語者
description.koreana: 덴팡과 스노우스피커스 부족을 도와 얼음 첨탑을 파괴하고 아이스스피커스를 쓰러뜨렸다

description.english: Aided Putargal and the Icespeaker tribe in destroying the Ice Spire and defeating the Snowspeakers
description.german: Du hast Putargal und dem Eisrufer-Stamm geholfen, den Eisstachel zu zerstören und die Schneerufer zu besiegen
description.french: Vous avez aidé Pautargal et la tribu des Glaciens à détruire l'Épine de Glace et vaincre les Neigeux
description.italian: Hai aiutato Putargal e la tribù dei Portavoce del Ghiaccio a distruggere la Guglia di Ghiaccio e sconfiggere i Portavoce della Neve
description.russian: Ты помог Путаргалу и племени Ледоголосов разрушить Ледяной шпиль и победить Снегоголосов
description.spanish: Ayudaste a Putargal y a la tribu Hablahielo a destruir el Pináculo de Hielo y derrotar a los Hablanieve
description.brazilian: Você ajudou Putargal e a tribo dos Gelofalantes a destruir a Agulha de Gelo e derrotar os Nevefalantes
description.schinese: 协助普塔格尔和冰语者部落摧毁了寒冰尖塔并击败了雪语者
description.tchinese: 協助普塔格爾和冰語者部落摧毀了寒冰尖塔並擊敗了雪語者
description.koreana: 푸타르갈과 아이스스피커스 부족을 도와 얼음 첨탑을 파괴하고 스노우스피커스를 쓰러뜨렸다

description.english: Defeated the Harbinger of Shadow and became a friend of the Icespeakers
description.german: Du hast den Vorboten des Schattens besiegt und bist ein Freund der Eisrufer geworden
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le Héraut de l'Ombre et êtes devenu un consort des Glaciens
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Araldo dell'Ombra e sei diventato amico dei Portavoce del Ghiaccio
description.russian: Ты победил Предвестника Тени и стал другом Ледоголосов
description.spanish: Derrotaste al Heraldo de la Sombra y te convertiste en amigo de los Hablahielo
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Arauto da Sombra e se tornou amigo dos Gelofalantes
description.schinese: 击败了暗影先驱，并成为冰语者的朋友
description.tchinese: 擊敗了暗影先驅，並成為冰語者的朋友
description.koreana: 어둠의 전조를 쓰러뜨리고 아이스스피커스의 친구가 되었다

description.english: Defeated the Render and became a friend of the Snowspeakers
description.german: Du hast den Render besiegt und bist ein Freund der Schneerufer geworden
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le Dépeceur et êtes devenu un consort des Neigeux
description.italian: Hai sconfitto lo Squartatore e sei diventato amico dei Portavoce della Neve
description.russian: Ты победил Разрывателя и стал другом Снегоголосов
description.spanish: Derrotaste al Desgarrador y te convertiste en amigo de los Hablanieve
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Lacerador e se tornou amigo dos Nevefalantes
description.schinese: 击败了撕裂者，并成为雪语者的朋友
description.tchinese: 擊敗了撕裂者，並成為雪語者的朋友

description.english: Destroyed the Heart of Ice and became a friend of the Frostspeakers
description.german: Du hast das Herz aus Eis zerstört und bist ein Freund der Frostrufer geworden
description.french: Vous avez détruit le Cœur de Glace et êtes devenu un consort des Givriens
description.italian: Hai distrutto il Cuore di Ghiaccio e sei diventato amico dei Portavoce del Gelo
description.russian: Ты разрушил Сердце льда и стал другом Морозоголосов
description.spanish: Destruiste el Corazón de Hielo y te convertiste en amigo de los Hablaescarcha
description.brazilian: Você destruiu o Coração de Gelo e se tornou amigo dos Friofalantes
description.schinese: 摧毁了寒冰之心，并成为霜语者的朋友
description.tchinese: 摧毀了寒冰之心，並成為霜語者的朋友
description.koreana: 얼음의 심장을 파괴하고 프로스트스피커스의 친구가 되었다

description.english: Defeated the Orphan
description.german: Du hast den Waisen besiegt
description.french: Vous avez vaincu l'Orphelin
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Orfano
description.russian: Ты победил Сироту
description.spanish: Derrotaste al Huérfano
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Órfão
description.schinese: 击败了遗孤
description.tchinese: 擊敗了遺孤

description.english: Helped the Orphan and became an ally to the Unfettered
description.german: Du hast dem Waisen geholfen und bist ein Verbündeter der Maschinenwesen geworden
description.french: Vous avez aidé l'Orphelin et êtes devenu un allié des Émancipés
description.italian: Hai aiutato l'Orfano e sei diventato alleato degli Svincolati
description.russian: Ты помог Сироте и стал союзником Непосредственного
description.spanish: Ayudaste al Huérfano y te convertiste en aliado de los Sin Ataduras
description.brazilian: Você ajudou o Órfão e se tornou um aliado dos Desatados
description.schinese: 帮助了遗孤，并成为自由机的盟友
description.tchinese: 幫助了遺孤，並成為自由機的盟友。
description.koreana: 고아를 도와 자유로운 자들의 아군이 되었다

description.english: Accepted the proposition of the Fish King
description.german: Du hast das Angebot des Fischkönigs angenommen
description.french: Vous avez accepté la proposition du Roi des Poissons
description.italian: Hai accettato la proposta del Re Pesce
description.russian: Ты принял предложение Рыбного короля
description.spanish: Aceptaste la proposición del Rey del Mar
description.brazilian: Você aceitou a proposta do Rei dos Peixes
description.schinese: 接受了鱼王的提议
description.tchinese: 接受了魚王的提議

description.english: Reached maximum morale
description.german: Du hast die maximale Moral erreicht
description.french: Vous avez atteint le moral maximum
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il morale massimo
description.russian: Ты достиг максимального морального духа
description.spanish: Alcanzaste la moral máxima
description.brazilian: Você alcançou a moral máxima
description.schinese: 达到最高士气
description.tchinese: 達到最高士氣

description.english: Enjoyed the summer Harvest Festival
description.german: Du hast das sommerliche Erntefest genossen
description.french: Vous avez profité du Festival des Récoltes estival
description.italian: Hai goduto della Festa del Raccolto estiva
description.russian: Ты насладился летним Фестивалем урожая
description.spanish: Disfrutaste del Festival de la Cosecha de verano
description.brazilian: Você aproveitou a Festa da Colheita no verão
description.schinese: 参与夏日丰收节
description.tchinese: 參與夏日豐收節

description.english: Painted the town's well red
description.german: Du hast den Brunnen der Stadt rot angemalt
description.french: Vous avez peint le puits de la ville en rouge
description.italian: Hai dipinto il pozzo della città di rosso
description.russian: Ты покрасил городской колодец в красный
description.spanish: Pintaste el pozo del pueblo de rojo
description.brazilian: Você pintou o poço da cidade de vermelho
description.schinese: 把城镇的水井漆成红色
description.tchinese: 把城鎮的水井漆成紅色

description.english: Painted the town's well blue
description.german: Du hast den Brunnen der Stadt blau angemalt
description.french: Vous avez peint le puits de la ville en bleu
description.italian: Hai dipinto il pozzo della città di blu
description.russian: Ты покрасил городской колодец в синий
description.spanish: Pintaste el pozo del pueblo de azul
description.brazilian: Você pintou o poço da cidade de azul
description.schinese: 把城镇的水井漆成蓝色
description.tchinese: 把城鎮的水井漆成藍色

description.english: Built a portcullis
description.german: Du hast ein Fallgitter gebaut
description.french: Vous avez construit une herse
description.italian: Hai costruito una saracinesca
description.russian: Ты построил подъёмный мост
description.spanish: Construiste un rastrillo
description.brazilian: Você construiu um portão levadiço
description.schinese: 建造了一个吊闸
description.tchinese: 建造了一個吊閘

description.english: Built a stage
description.german: Du hast eine Bühne gebaut
description.french: Vous avez construit une scène
description.italian: Hai costruito un palco
description.russian: Ты построил сцену
description.spanish: Construiste un escenario
description.brazilian: Você construiu um palco
description.schinese: 建造了一个舞台
description.tchinese: 建造了一個舞臺

description.english: Allowed the Ice Obelisk to remain outside of Frosthaven
description.german: Du hast den Eisobelisk außerhalb von Frosthaven stehen lassen
description.french: Vous avez laissé l'Obélisque de Glace rester en dehors de Havreblanc
description.italian: Hai permesso all'Obelisco di Ghiaccio di rimanere fuori da Frosthaven
description.russian: Ты позволил Ледяному обелиску остаться за пределами Фростхавена
description.spanish: Permitiste que el Obelisco de Hielo permaneciera fuera de Frosthaven
description.brazilian: Você permitiu que o Obelisco de Gelo permanecesse fora de Frosthaven
description.schinese: 允许冰块方尖碑留在寒霜港外
description.tchinese: 允許冰塊方尖碑留在寒霜港外

description.english: Didn't let the Firepeppers go to waste
description.german: Du hast die Feuerpfeffer nicht verschwendet
description.french: Vous n'avez pas laissé les piments-de-feu se perdre
description.italian: Non hai lasciato che i fuocopepe andassero sprecati
description.russian: Ты не дал Огненным перцам пропасть зря
description.spanish: No dejaste que las pimientas de fuego se desperdiciaran
description.brazilian: Você não deixou as pimentas-fogosas irem para o lixo
description.schinese: 没有浪费火椒
description.tchinese: 沒有浪費火椒

description.english: Took the talking beetle
description.german: Du hast den sprechenden Käfer mitgenommen
description.french: Vous avez pris le scarabée parlant
description.italian: Hai preso lo scarabeo parlante
description.russian: Ты взял говорящего жука
description.spanish: Te llevaste el escarabajo parlante
description.brazilian: Você pegou o besouro falante
description.schinese: 带走了会说话的甲虫
description.tchinese: 帶走了會說話的甲蟲

description.english: Helped a harrower in distress
description.german: Du hast einem Harrower in Not geholfen
description.french: Vous avez aidé un harrower en détresse
description.italian: Hai aiutato un harrower in difficoltà
description.russian: Ты помог уничтожителю в беде
description.spanish: Ayudaste a un harrower en apuros
description.brazilian: Você ajudou um Harrower em perigo
description.schinese: 帮助了一位陷入困境的骇虫
description.tchinese: 幫助了一位陷入困境的駭蟲

description.english: Relieved the malfunctioning mechanism of its power core
description.german: Du hast den defekten Mechanismus von seinem Energiekern befreit
description.french: Vous avez soulagé le mécanisme défectueux de son noyau de puissance
description.italian: Hai liberato il meccanismo guasto dal suo nucleo di potenza
description.russian: Ты избавил неисправный механизм от его энергетического ядра
description.spanish: Aliviaste al mecanismo defectuoso de su núcleo de poder
description.brazilian: Você aliviou o mecanismo defeituoso do seu centro de energia
description.schinese: 移除了故障装置上的动力核心
description.tchinese: 移除了故障裝置上的動力核心

description.english: Put the charged power core to use
description.german: Du hast den geladenen Energiekern genutzt
description.french: Vous avez utilisé le noyau de puissance chargé
description.italian: Hai messo in uso il nucleo di potenza carico
description.russian: Ты использовал заряженное энергетическое ядро
description.spanish: Usaste el núcleo de poder cargado
description.brazilian: Você colocou o centro de energia carregado em uso
description.schinese: 将充能的动力核心投入使用
description.tchinese: 將充能的動力核心投入使用

description.english: You found traces from an unknown creature
description.german: Du hast Spuren einer unbekannten Kreatur gefunden
description.french: Vous avez trouvé des traces d'une créature inconnue
description.italian: Hai trovato tracce di una creatura sconosciuta
description.russian: Ты обнаружил следы неизвестного существа
description.spanish: Encontraste rastros de una criatura desconocida
description.brazilian: Você encontrou rastros de uma criatura desconhecida
description.schinese: 你发现了来自未知生物的痕迹
description.tchinese: 你發現了來自未知生物的痕跡
description.koreana: 알 수 없는 생명체의 흔적을 발견했다

description.english: You found the creature!
description.german: Du hast die Kreatur gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la créature !
description.italian: Hai trovato la creatura!
description.russian: Ты нашёл существо!
description.spanish: ¡Encontraste a la criatura!
description.brazilian: Você encontrou a criatura!
description.schinese: 你找到了那个生物！
description.tchinese: 你找到了那個生物！

description.english: Dealt a total of 1000 or more damage with a hero
description.german: Du hast insgesamt 1000 oder mehr Schaden mit einem Helden verursacht
description.french: Vous avez infligé un total de 1000 dégâts ou plus avec un héros
description.italian: Hai inflitto un totale di 1000 o più danni con un eroe
description.russian: Ты нанёс в сумме 1000 или больше урона одним героем
description.spanish: Infligiste un total de 1000 o más de daño con un héroe
description.brazilian: Você causou um total de 1000 ou mais de dano com um herói
description.schinese: 使用角色造成累积1000以上的伤害
description.tchinese: 使用角色造成累積1000以上的傷害
description.koreana: 한 영웅으로 총 1000 이상의 피해를 입혔다

description.english: Moved for 500 hexes with a hero
description.german: Du hast dich mit einem Helden über 500 Felder bewegt
description.french: Vous avez parcouru 500 hexagones avec un héros
description.italian: Hai percorso 500 esagoni con un eroe
description.russian: Ты переместился на 500 клеток одним героем
description.spanish: Te moviste 500 hexágonos con un héroe
description.brazilian: Você se moveu por 500 hexágonos com um herói
description.schinese: 使用角色移动超过500个格子
description.tchinese: 使用角色移動超過500個格子

description.english: Completed the Main Campaign at Story difficulty
description.german: Du hast die Hauptkampagne auf dem Story-Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé la campagne principale en difficulté Histoire
description.italian: Hai completato la campagna principale a difficoltà Storia
description.russian: Ты завершил основную кампанию на сложности "История"
description.spanish: Completaste la campaña principal en dificultad Historia
description.brazilian: Você completou a Campanha Principal na dificuldade História
description.schinese: 在故事难度下完成了主线剧情
description.tchinese: 在故事難度下完成了主線劇情

description.english: Completed the Main Campaign at Normal difficulty
description.german: Du hast die Hauptkampagne auf dem normalen Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé la campagne principale en difficulté Normale
description.italian: Hai completato la campagna principale a difficoltà Normale
description.russian: Ты завершил основную кампанию на обычной сложности
description.spanish: Completaste la campaña principal en dificultad Normal
description.brazilian: Você completou a Campanha Principal na dificuldade Normal
description.schinese: 在普通难度下完成了主线剧情
description.tchinese: 在普通難度下完成了主線劇情

description.english: Completed the Main Campaign at Veteran difficulty
description.german: Du hast die Hauptkampagne auf dem Veteranen-Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé la campagne principale en difficulté Vétéran
description.italian: Hai completato la campagna principale a difficoltà Veterano
description.russian: Ты завершил основную кампанию на сложности "Ветеран"
description.spanish: Completaste la campaña principal en dificultad Veterano
description.brazilian: Você completou a Campanha Principal na dificuldade Veterano
description.schinese: 在老兵难度下完成了主线剧情
description.tchinese: 在老兵難度下完成了主線劇情

description.english: Completed the Main Campaign at Hard difficulty
description.german: Du hast die Hauptkampagne auf dem schweren Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez terminé la campagne principale en difficulté Difficile
description.italian: Hai completato la campagna principale a difficoltà Difficile
description.russian: Ты завершил основную кампанию на высокой сложности
description.spanish: Completaste la campaña principal en dificultad Difícil

description.tchinese: 在殘暴難度下完成了主線劇情

description.english: Repelled the Algox attack on Frosthaven

description.tchinese: 擊退了冰角對寒霜港的攻擊

description.english: Defeat the Vermling Warchief
